label: 日本永代蔵
本: The Cambridge History of Japan, Volume 4:  Early Modern Japan . Cambridge University Press . 1991
説明文: Subtitle: The new bible for getting rich↓Book by Ihara Saikaku, [which] contains thrity stories about ingenious or unpredictable ways in which businessmen made or lost money.  The ideal that runs through the stories is establishing a fortune or perptuating a prosperous family enterprise (p. 763). [井原西鶴]
